mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIP_MEMBERS ( TM_SEQ, TR_SEQ, M_SEQ, TM_ROLE, TM_NAME, TM_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(TM_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TRIP_MEMBERS A), #{trSeq}, #{mSeq}, #{tmRole}, #{tmName}, #{tmId} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRIP_MEMBERS WHERE TR_SEQ = #{trSeq}

SELECT TR_SEQ as trSeq ,TR_NAME as trName ,TR_MODE as trMode ,TR_AREA_SET as trAreaSet ,TR_DATE_SET as trDateSet ,TR_STEPS as trSteps ,TR_STEP_STATUS as trStepStatus ,TR_GENDER_SET as trGenderSet ,TR_PERSONNEL_SET as trPersonnelSet ,TR_LICENSE_SET as trLicenseSet ,TR_TRANSPORTATION_SET as trTransprotationSet ,TR_PASSWORD_SET as trPasswordSet ,TR_INTRO as trIntro ,TR_IMG_NAME as trImgName ,TR_IMG_PATH as trImgPath FROM TRIP
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIP_FILE ( SEQ, F_SEQ, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE ) VALUES ( #{seq}, ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(F_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TRIP_FILE A WHERE SEQ = #{seq} ), #{originalFileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.select: SELECT TM_SEQ FROM TRIP_MEMBERS WHERE M_SEQ = #{mSeq} AND TR_SEQ = #{trSeq}

SELECT a.CM_SEQ as cmSeq , a.TR_SEQ as trSeq , a.M_SEQ as mSeq , a.CM_TIME as cmTime , a.CM_COMENT as cmComent , b.M_NICKNAME as mNickname , b.M_IMG_NAME as mImgName FROM randomjeju.comment as a, randomjeju.member as b WHERE a.M_SEQ = b.M_SEQ AND TR_SEQ=#{trSeq} ORDER BY CM_SEQ DESC;
